attributes.additional_details:
please all disabled voters hold this coalition  government sort out equality for disabled UK voters

even the simple things of ensuring councils have a responsibility to ensure wheelchair users in need of emergency accommodation receive a property they can enter, is sufficient for their wheelchair inside seem beyond the coalition government

if you’re a UK voter please sign this petition to ensure the coalition ensure equality of accessing services for all disabled people in the UK (both mental and physical disabilities)

we who sign this petition will vote for a non-coalition party at the next election unless equality of access both physical access and access to the systems of the state for benefits (I'm a dysarthria suffer and can't talk without problems hence because of issues with accessing benefits services I have to physically travel in my wheelchair to my local council office or Job Centre to seek assistance with almost everything)
